scripts.prepare:test1: mustache config/test1.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/test1.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:test2: mustache config/test2.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/test2.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:test3: mustache config/test3.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/test3.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:staging: mustache config/staging.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/staging.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.prepare:prod: mustache config/prod.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml > subgraph.yaml & mustache config/prod.json src/config.template.ts > src/config.ts
scripts.deploy:test1: npm run prepare:test1 & graph deploy --studio peeranha-amoy
scripts.deploy:test2: npm run prepare:test2 & graph deploy --product hosted-service peeranha/peeranha-test-2
scripts.deploy:test3: npm run prepare:test3 & graph deploy --product hosted-service peeranha/peeranha-test-3
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run prepare:staging & graph deploy --studio peeranha-amoy-staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prepare:prod & graph deploy --studio peeranha
